snippet.title: Synth Riders [Gameplay Trailer]
snippet.description:
Let the music move you in the fan-favorite #VR rhythm game on #MetaQuest, #PSVR2, #AVP, PICO and Steam (PCVR).

This trailer features @Naysy  & @omotea1926 

--------------------------------------
Play Synth Riders on Meta Quest: https://oculus.com/experiences/quest/2436558143118760/
Play Synth Riders on SteamVR: https://store.steampowered.com/app/885000/Synth_Riders/
Play Synth Riders on PSVR2: https://store.playstation.com/concept/235392

Join the Synth Riders Discord Community: http://discord.synthridersvr.com/​

Follow #SynthRiders​:
Newsletter: https://synthridersvr.com/newsletter
Twitter: https://twitter.com/synthridersvr​
Facebook: http://fb.me/synthridersvr​
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/synthridersvr/
